description:
Superstitions can be common in the military. Maki wonders if recent events are a sign of ominous things to come. Meanwhile, the class puts on a play.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Hello Sadness: Once Upon a Dime
Kanashimi yo konnichiwa - Once Upon A Dime -
悲しみよこんにちは - Once Upon A Dime -
슬픔이여 안녕: Once Upon A Dime
